entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Jasper
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 a.m. MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Widespread smoke. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local smoke. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
